title: import mlfinlab gives numba error
body:
Hi! 

I use WinPython 3.7 with Visual Studio Code. When I attempt importing the package I get the following error. 

Any ideas how I can proceed?

```
import mlfinlab
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\numba\typeconv\typeconv.py in 
      5     # Numba, if it fails to import, provide some feedback
----> 6     from . import _typeconv
      7 except ImportError as e:

ImportError: DLL load failed: Det angivne modul blev ikke fundet.

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
c:\Users\Beartrap\OneDrive - Aarhus universitet\Python\Cointegration.py in 
----> 1 import mlfinlab

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\mlfinlab\__init__.py in 
      4 
      5 import mlfinlab.cross_validation as cross_validation
----> 6 import mlfinlab.data_structures as data_structures
      7 import mlfinlab.multi_product as multi_product
      8 import mlfinlab.filters.filters as filters

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\mlfinlab\data_structures\__init__.py in 
     14 """
     15 
---> 16 from mlfinlab.data_structures.imbalance_data_structures import get_ema_dollar_imbalance_bars, \
     17     get_ema_volume_imbalance_bars, \
     18     get_ema_tick_imbalance_bars, get_const_dollar_imbalance_bars, get_const_volume_imbalance_bars, \

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\mlfinlab\data_structures\imbalance_data_structures.py in 
     27 import pandas as pd
     28 
---> 29 from mlfinlab.data_structures.base_bars import BaseImbalanceBars
     30 from mlfinlab.util.fast_ewma import ewma
     31 

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\mlfinlab\data_structures\base_bars.py in 
     10 import pandas as pd
     11 
---> 12 from mlfinlab.util.fast_ewma import ewma
     13 
     14 

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\mlfinlab\util\__init__.py in 
      3 """
      4 
----> 5 from mlfinlab.util.fast_ewma import ewma
      6 from mlfinlab.util.multiprocess import expand_call, lin_parts, mp_pandas_obj, nested_parts, process_jobs, process_jobs_, \
      7     report_progress

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\mlfinlab\util\fast_ewma.py in 
      7 # Imports
      8 import numpy as np
----> 9 from numba import jit
     10 from numba import float64
     11 from numba import int64

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\numba\__init__.py in 
     18 
     19 # Re-export typeof
---> 20 from .special import (
     21     typeof, prange, pndindex, gdb, gdb_breakpoint, gdb_init,
     22     literally

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\numba\special.py in 
      3 import numpy as np
      4 
----> 5 from .typing.typeof import typeof
      6 
      7 

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\numba\typing\__init__.py in 
      1 from __future__ import absolute_import
----> 2 from .context import BaseContext, Context
      3 from .templates import (signature, make_concrete_template, Signature,
      4                         fold_arguments)

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\numba\typing\context.py in 
     10 import numba
     11 from numba import types, errors
---> 12 from numba.typeconv import Conversion, rules
     13 from . import templates
     14 from .typeof import typeof, Purpose

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\numba\typeconv\rules.py in 
      1 from __future__ import print_function, absolute_import
      2 import itertools
----> 3 from .typeconv import TypeManager, TypeCastingRules
      4 from numba import types
      5 

C:\Python\WPy64-3760\python-3.7.6.amd64\lib\site-packages\numba\typeconv\typeconv.py in 
     14            "development:\n%s\nThe original error was: '%s'") % \
     15            (url, reportme, str(e))
---> 16     raise ImportError(msg)
     17 
     18 from . import castgraph, Conversion

ImportError: Numba could not be imported.
If you are seeing this message and are undertaking Numba development work, you may need to re-run:

python setup.py build_ext --inplace

(Also, please check the development set up guide http://numba.pydata.org/numba-doc/latest/developer/contributing.html.)

If you are not working on Numba development:

Please report the error message and traceback, along with a minimal reproducer
at: https://github.com/numba/numba/issues/new

If more help is needed please feel free to speak to the Numba core developers
directly at: https://gitter.im/numba/numba

Thanks in advance for your help in improving Numba!

The original error was: 'DLL load failed: Det angivne modul blev ikke fundet.'
```
